product_vision_and_strategy.description: Ability to define and communicate a clear product vision that aligns with business objectives and market needs.
product_vision_and_strategy.title: Product Vision And Strategy

requirements_gathering.description: Skilled in gathering and prioritizing product requirements through effective user research and stakeholder engagement.
requirements_gathering.title: Requirements Gathering

cross-functional_collaboration.description: Ability to work effectively with engineering, design, and marketing teams to ensure successful product launches.
cross-functional_collaboration.title: Cross-Functional Collaboration

product_lifecycle_management.description: Overseeing product development from conception to launch, ensuring all strategic goals are met.
product_lifecycle_management.title: Product Lifecycle Management

technical_understanding_of_ai.description: Possesses a solid understanding of AI technologies and their application in product development.
technical_understanding_of_ai.title: Technical Understanding Of Ai

analytical_skills.description: Ability to analyze complex data and use insights to drive product decisions effectively.
analytical_skills.title: Analytical Skills

communication_skills.description: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, fostering a team-oriented mindset.
communication_skills.title: Communication Skills

problem-solving_abilities.description: Proactive in identifying problems and devising customer-focused solutions.
problem-solving_abilities.title: Problem-Solving Abilities

evaluators.Relevance Evaluator: what questions would you ask the user to check if the answer is relevant to the question?
evaluators.Exaggeration Evaluator: what questions would you ask the user to check if they are exaggerating?

sample_framework.description: a sample framework given the question
sample_framework.title: Sample Framework

user_framework.description: the implicit framework the user has used in their answer to the question
user_framework.title: User Framework

evaluation.description: the evaluation of the user's framework against the sample framework
evaluation.title: Evaluation
